Create_Project_Record_Page.heading: Create a project record
Create_Project_Record_Page.guidance_text_one: As it's the first time you're using this service to manage your project, we need you to enter a few details to add your project to the system.
Create_Project_Record_Page.guidance_text_two: The information we'll ask for can all be found on your original application or an approved modification so have this with you before starting. Use whichever information is the most up to date.
Create_Project_Record_Page.guidance_text_three: To align with the changes to terminology introduced by the updated clinical trials regulations, amendments are now being referred to as modifications.
Create_Project_Record_Page.guidance_text_Four: You'll need to provide an answer to all the questions but you can save your progress and come back later if you need to.
